key.name: language
key.description: Language for the user interface (auto, en, de)

key.name: minimize-to-tray
key.description: When playing, minimize to system tray instead of closing

key.name: notify-on-minimize
key.description: Show a notification when the application is minimized. This is often redundant on desktops with MPRIS support (like GNOME).

key.name: remember-last-station
key.description: Automatically load the last played station on startup

key.name: window-width
key.description: Width of the main window

key.name: window-height
key.description: Height of the main window

key.name: window-maximized
key.description: Whether the window is maximized

key.name: volume
key.description: Audio volume level (0.0-1.0)

key.name: normalize-volume
key.description: Automatically normalize audio volume across different streams

key.name: buffer-size
key.description: Network buffer size in bytes for streaming

key.name: equalizer-enabled
key.description: Enable or disable the 10-band equalizer

key.name: equalizer-preset
key.description: Current equalizer preset (flat, rock, pop, jazz, classical, speech, bass-boost, treble-boost, custom)

key.name: equalizer-band0
key.description: Gain for 31 Hz frequency band in dB

key.name: equalizer-band1
key.description: Gain for 62 Hz frequency band in dB

key.name: equalizer-band2
key.description: Gain for 125 Hz frequency band in dB

key.name: equalizer-band3
key.description: Gain for 250 Hz frequency band in dB

key.name: equalizer-band4
key.description: Gain for 500 Hz frequency band in dB

key.name: equalizer-band5
key.description: Gain for 1 kHz frequency band in dB

key.name: equalizer-band6
key.description: Gain for 2 kHz frequency band in dB

key.name: equalizer-band7
key.description: Gain for 4 kHz frequency band in dB

key.name: equalizer-band8
key.description: Gain for 8 kHz frequency band in dB

key.name: equalizer-band9
key.description: Gain for 16 kHz frequency band in dB

key.name: recording-format
key.description: Audio format for recordings (mp3, flac, ogg, wav)

key.name: recording-directory
key.description: Directory path for saving recordings (empty = ~/Music/Recordings)

key.name: recording-filename-template
key.description: Template for recording filenames (variables: {station}, {date}, {time}, {title}, {artist})

key.name: recording-auto-start
key.description: Automatically start recording when playback begins

key.name: quality-filter-min-bitrate
key.description: Minimum bitrate for station filtering in kbps (0 = no filter)

key.name: default-country
key.description: Default country for station filtering (empty = all countries)

key.name: language-filter
key.description: List of languages to filter stations by

key.name: order-by
key.description: Default ordering for station lists (votes, clickcount, bitrate, name)

key.name: show-explicit-content
key.description: Include stations with potentially explicit content

key.name: show-spectrum
key.description: Display audio spectrum visualization

key.name: spectrum-style
key.description: Visual style for spectrum (bars, line, gradient)

key.name: current-page
key.description: Currently selected page (discover, favorites, history, now-playing)

key.name: sleep-timer-enabled
key.description: Whether the sleep timer is currently active

key.name: sleep-timer-minutes
key.description: Sleep timer duration in minutes

key.name: sleep-timer-action
key.description: Action to perform when timer expires (stop, pause, quit)
